acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 74 byteObjectField = 102 shortField = 43 shortObjectField = 80 charField = d charObjectField = V intField = 42062287 intObjectField = -2084209521 longField = 664603946207831 longObjectField = 664603945920368 floatField = 0.4042279 floatObjectField = 0.7473472 doubleField = 0.9631771548160817 doubleObjectField = 0.23185009203260654 stringField = 43ZVNwXxq0 objectField = java.lang.Object@2b48931b calendarField = Wed Jul 08 23:32:09 BST 2015 dateField = Wed Jul 08 23:32:09 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@63a875e6 intArray = [I@3689931e booleanArray = [Z@757908d8 bigDecimalField = 440084465190 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{aqVOAAS0mc=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1436394729302 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@54271d08 elements
